short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share the screen from your computer in a video conversation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share the screen from your computer in a video conversation.
This extension lets you share your screen with other participants in a Turtle Video.
Without the extension, you can still use Turtle Video with a compatible browser, but you will be unable to share your own computer's screen.
